title: Start
body:
"Chosen one, the integrity of time has been compromised.
The storm of 1674 has weakened the fabric of time and space, causing a time rift here and now."

[[I'm intrigued! Why? |RestoringTheSquare]]  [[I'm not taking part in this|Lame user]]

title: RestoringTheSquare
body:
"Now that they are restoring the Dom Tower the rift has been opened.
Several historical figures  have been transported to the present, as well the basilisk of Utrecht."

"The terrible beast has left them petrified throughout the city.

You must free them and send them back to their timeline and defeat the Basilisk to prevent the collapse of history.
If you fail, the rift will grow bigger, sucking in Utrecht and its inhabitants, and eventually the entire world."

"If you succeed, you shall be rewarded for your bravery." 
[[I'm brave|continue brave]]  [[But how?|continue brave]]

title: DoNotQuestionFate
body:
"It is not for us to question fate. Now be on your way. Time is wasting."
 [[okay|Nextlevel]]  [[But wait, I've some more questio...|Nextlevel]]

title: end1 lame user stops the game
continue brave
body:
"Take this common rue concoction, apply it to the petrified characters and they shall be freed from their bronze prison."

"You will find the Poet Fran√ßois Villon behind Dom Church. Go to him, he will help you find the other historical figures. Be careful! Villon has been know to pick a pocket or two."

"Now be on your way Chosen one, good luck!"
[[Wait, why me? |DoNotQuestionFate]] [[Ok|Nextlevel]]

title: Lame user
body:
"Are you devoid of any sense of bravery and righteousness?

The faith of the world is at stake!" 

 [[Yes i'm a coward take me out of here|End game start (lame user)]][[ No I want to help! |RestoringTheSquare]]

title: End game start (lame user)
body:
"You fool! You have doomed us all! "

[img]/assets/data-models/stories/20201000024_oracle_start/Utrechtbasilisk_1.png[/img]

Basilisk: Screeeeeechhh 

"Can you hear it?"

"The Basilisk is celebrating its victory."


The Basilisk dances in victory. 

The rift opens and swallows everything in Utrecht and spreads through the world. 

The screen goes white. 

"Congratulations the world has ended because of you"
 [[end game please. I don't care about the ending of the world |end1 lame user stops the game]] [[No wait! Take me be back|RestoringTheSquare]]
